title: Show 52 - Christmas Special with Sayeeda Warsi & Nick Clegg
itunes:title: Show 52 - Christmas Special with Sayeeda Warsi & Nick Clegg

description:
Former Conservative Party chair Baroness Sayeeda Warsi and former Deputy Prime Minister Nick Clegg join Matt to discuss their books, Cabinet rows, Christmas and why Sayeeda definitely wasn't part of an Islamist sleeper cell. The world's only Parliamentary rock band, MP4 are also part of the action. For future dates please visit www.mattforde.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
